text: Bouquehault (Dutch:Beukholt) is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 10 miles (16 km) south of Calais, on the D248 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Omer, dating from the sixteenth century. * The nineteenth centuryChâteau de Dippendal. * The remains of an old château. * A ruined windmill, built in 1868. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de- Calais
title: Bouquehault
